name: Filbert Cheese Ball
author: mjski
summary: When I set one of these appetizers out on a plate with knife and crackers, it draws a crowd! It disappears so fast, I keep a spare in the refrigerator, and a couple in the freezer for the holidays.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package grated sharp Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Mix Cheddar cheese, cream cheese, blue cheese, butter, onion, and Worcestershire sauce together in a bowl using an electric mixer or in a food processor until thoroughly blended
Divide mixture into 2 balls using wet hands
Wrap balls in waxed paper and refrigerate until cool and firm, about 1 hour
Smooth and shape; roll firmly in chopped filberts
Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to serve, at least 1 hour
Garnish each cheese ball with 1 cherry half and parsley 1 hour before serving
